The crystal-clear acrylic construction lets you monitor seed levels and water quality visually, while the separate compartments cross. Its decorative transparent bird bath tub styling adds a modern touch to cages or outdoor hooks. The pull-out external parrot feede [sic] tray’s streamlined profile fits most standard cages, and its 360° viewing angles let birds interact safely during meals.
